thing-type.label: Modbus Data
thing-type.description: Data thing extracts values from binary data received from Modbus slave. Similarly, it is responsible of translating openHAB commands to Modbus write requests

parameter.name: readStart
parameter.label: Read Address
parameter.description:
Start address to start reading the value. Use empty for write-only things.

Input as zero-based index number, e.g. in place of 400001 (first holding register), use the address 0. Must be between (poller start) and (poller start + poller length - 1) (inclusive).

With registers and value type less than 16 bits, you must use X.Y format where Y specifies the sub-element to read from the 16 bit register:
  • For example, 3.1 would mean pick second bit from register index 3 with bit value type.
  • With int8 valuetype, it would pick the high byte of register index 3.

parameter.name: readTransform
parameter.label: Read Transform
parameter.description:
Transformation to apply to polled data, after it has been converted to number using readValueType

Use "default" to communicate that no transformation is done and value should be passed as is.
Use SERVICENAME(ARG) or SERVICENAME:ARG to use transformation service.
Any other value than the above types will be interpreted as static text, in which case the actual content of the polled value is ignored.
You can chain many transformations with ∩, for example SERVICE1:ARG1∩SERVICE2:ARG2

parameter.name: readValueType
parameter.label: Read Value Type
parameter.description:
How data is read from modbus. Use empty for write-only things.

With registers all value types are applicable.

options.option: 64bit signed integer, 16bit words in reverse order (dcba) (int64_swap)
64bit unsigned integer, 16bit words in reverse order (dcba) (uint64_swap)

parameter.name: writeStart
parameter.label: Write Address
parameter.description:
Start address of the first holding register or coil in the write. Use empty for read-only things.
Use zero based address, e.g. in place of 400001 (first holding register), use the address 0. This address is passed to data frame as is.
One can write individual bits of an register using X.Y format where X is the register and Y is the bit (0 refers to least significant bit).

parameter.name: writeType
parameter.label: Write Type
parameter.description:
Type of data to write. Leave empty for read-only things.

Coil uses function code (FC) FC05 or FC15. Holding register uses FC06 or FC16. See writeMultipleEvenWithSingleRegisterOrCoil parameter.

parameter.name: writeTransform
parameter.label: Write Transform
parameter.description:
Transformation to apply to received commands.

Use "default" to communicate that no transformation is done and value should be passed as is.
Use SERVICENAME(ARG) or SERVICENAME:ARG to use transformation service.
Any other value than the above types will be interpreted as static text, in which case the actual content of the command
You can chain many transformations with ∩, for example SERVICE1:ARG1∩SERVICE2:ARG2 value is ignored.

parameter.name: writeValueType
parameter.label: Write Value Type
parameter.description:
How data is written to modbus. Only applicable to registers, you can leave this undefined for coil.

Negative integers are encoded with two's complement, while positive integers are encoded as is.

options.option: 64bit positive or negative integer, 4 registers (int64, uint64)
64bit positive or negative integer, 4 registers but with 16bit words/registers in reverse order (dcba) (int64_swap, uint64_swap)
32bit positive or negative integer, 2 registers (int32, uint32)
32bit positive or negative integer, 2 registers but with 16bit words/registers in reverse order (ba) (int32_swap, uint32_swap)
16bit positive or negative integer, 1 register (int16, uint16)

parameter.name: writeMultipleEvenWithSingleRegisterOrCoil
parameter.label: Write Multiple Even with Single Register or Coil
parameter.description:
Whether single register / coil of data is written using FC16 ("Write Multiple Holding Registers") / FC15 ("Write Multiple Coils"), respectively.

If false, FC6/FC5 are used with single register and single coil, respectively.

parameter.name: writeMaxTries
parameter.label: Maximum Tries When Writing
parameter.description: Number of tries when writing data, if some of the writes fail. For single try, enter 1.

parameter.name: updateUnchangedValuesEveryMillis
parameter.label: Interval for Updating Unchanged Values
parameter.description: Interval to update unchanged values. Normally unchanged values are not updated. In milliseconds.
